title: Khairuddin, like many of the cosmopolitan actors discussed in this book, enjoyed the patronage of Caliph Abd-al Majid. He stayed in Istanbul for two years and received a government scholarship. His time in the city was spent in the company of scholars, in libraries, and copying books that interested him.
